SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerModelLayer
public class Game extends Object implements ServerModelLayer
This Class stores all the information about the current game, including the list of players, the current game phase, the current round etc.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(Lobby lobby, List<LobbyUser> lobbyUsers, ObserverRelay gameObserverRelay, List<Card> goldenCards, List<Card> resourceCards, List<Card> starterCards, List<Objective> objectives)
      Default Constructor.
      Initializes a Model.Game.Game object by taking Players ArrayList, Golden and Resource Model.Game.Deck, and ArrayList of Objectives.
      Automatically
      Parameters:
      lobbyUsers - List of lobby users taking part to this game.
      goldenCards - List of Golden Cards to use during this game.
      resourceCards - List of Resource Cards to use during this game.
      starterCards - List of Starter Cards to use during this game.
      objectives - List of Objectives to use during this game.

      Parameters:

    • playCard

      public void playCard(String username, int cardIndex, int coordinateIndex, boolean faceUp) throws NotYourTurnException, MoveAttemptOnWaitStateException, InvalidActionForPlayerStateException, InvalidActionForGameStateException, CoordinateIndexOutOfBounds
      Initiates playing a card by a specified player.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player initiating the action
      cardIndex - the index of the card to be played
      coordinateIndex - the index of the coordinate where the card will be played
      faceUp - whether the card should be played face up or not
      Throws:
      NotYourTurnException - if it's not the player's turn to perform this action
      MoveAttemptOnWaitStateException - if an attempt to perform a move in a WAIT state is made
      InvalidActionForPlayerStateException - if the action is invalid for the current player's state
      InvalidActionForGameStateException - if the action is invalid for the current game state
      CoordinateIndexOutOfBounds - if the coordinate index is out of bounds

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(String username, CardPoolTypes cardPoolType, int index) throws NotYourTurnException, MoveAttemptOnWaitStateException, MaxResourceCardsDrawnException, InvalidActionForPlayerStateException, InvalidActionForGameStateException, MaxGoldenCardsDrawnException
      Initiates drawing a card by a specified player.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player initiating the action
      cardPoolType - the type of card pool from which to draw the card
      index - the index of the card to draw
      Throws:
      NotYourTurnException - if it's not the player's turn to perform this action
      MoveAttemptOnWaitStateException - if an attempt to perform a move in a WAIT state is made
      MaxResourceCardsDrawnException - if the maximum number of resource cards has been drawn already
      InvalidActionForPlayerStateException - if the action is invalid for the current player's state
      InvalidActionForGameStateException - if the action is invalid for the current game state
      MaxGoldenCardsDrawnException - if the maximum number of golden cards has been drawn already

    • pickPlayerObjective

      public void pickPlayerObjective(String username, int objectiveIndex) throws MoveAttemptOnWaitStateException, InvalidActionForPlayerStateException, InvalidActionForGameStateException
      Initiates a player picking an objective.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player initiating the action
      objectiveIndex - the index of the objective to pick
      Throws:
      MoveAttemptOnWaitStateException - if an attempt to perform a move in a WAIT state is made
      InvalidActionForPlayerStateException - if the action is invalid for the current player's state
      InvalidActionForGameStateException - if the action is invalid for the current game state

    • shouldRemovePlayerOnDisconnect

      public boolean shouldRemovePlayerOnDisconnect()
      Checks if a player should be removed upon disconnection based on the current game state.
      Returns:
      true if the player should be removed on disconnect, false otherwise

    • incrementRoundsCompleted

      public void incrementRoundsCompleted()
      Increments the count of rounds completed in the game. This method increments the internal counter tracking the number of completed rounds. If a game observer relay is set, it updates the observers with the latest game state using SCPUpdateGame packet.

    • checkGameEndingConditions

      public boolean checkGameEndingConditions()
      Method verifies whether the conditions for the game-end are met, if so sets to true the lastRound flag.

    • selectWinners

      protected void selectWinners()
      Determines the winners of the game based on points and objectives completed. Players are sorted first by points in descending order, and then by objectives completed. If there is a tie on both points and objectives, multiple players can be selected as winners. Updates the player objects by setting the `winner` flag for those who are winners. Logs the winners to the logger.

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver()
      Handles the game-over scenario by performing the following steps: - Retrieves the shared objectives from the table. - Calculates points for each player based on the shared objectives. - Determines the winners using the `selectWinners()` method. - Updates observers with the game-over information using SCPGameOver packet. - Signals the end of the game to the lobby.

    • toPlayerRecordList

      public List<PlayerRecord> toPlayerRecordList()
      Converts the list of players into a list of PlayerRecord objects. Each PlayerRecord represents a transferable data object containing essential player information.
      Returns:
      a list of PlayerRecord objects representing each player in the game

    • toCardMapRecordsMap

      public Map<String,CardMapRecord> toCardMapRecordsMap()
      Converts the list of players into a map where the key is the player's username and the value is the corresponding CardMapRecord object. Each CardMapRecord contains information about the cards held by the player.
      Returns:
      a map of player usernames to CardMapRecord objects representing the cards held by each player

    • toRecord

      public GameRecord toRecord()
      Converts the current state of the game into a GameRecord object. The GameRecord encapsulates information about the game's current state, including rounds completed and setup status.
      Returns:
      a GameRecord object representing the current state of the game
